| Louis Blanc, Bear Witness
}} 'House Vs. Hurricane' is an Australian progressive post-hardcore band from
Melbourne, Victoria formed in 2006. In 2008 the group released their debut EP
entitled [[Forfeiture (album)|Forfeiture]], http://www.billboard.com/album/house-vs-
hurricane/forfeiture/1179995 which received positive reviews and
Australian airplay, making them a local favourite.

The band has completed and released their debut studio album, [[Perspectives
(album)|Perspectives]], which was released in March 2010. They have completed on
an Australian/New Zealand tour in support of the new album, they took part in
farewell tour called The Moving On Tour for the lead singer Chris Dicker who had
recently announced that he was leaving the band. In December 2011 they announced
his replacement, Dan Casey from Louis Blanc (previously known as Nazarite Vow).
